resources.string: You are now arrived to an app representing horadric cube recipes
Here you can easily check all cube recipes and also have a chat with other fellow travellers
Remember, you are always welcome here
To be able to edit your profile, you need to log in to chats first.

Hello friend!
App is currently under development and I'm planning to add more features soon, Please report any suggestions or bugs you found to in-app group chat "App feedback" or feel free to send an email to app.diablocube@yahoo.com 

App was intended to be just a nice representation of cube recipes and not an overall diablo database resource, but it can be added later if there will be any API with all data. 

Current development plan includes: 
-add runewords 
-add localization(probably ru first) 
-improve current cube view 

Remember, you are welcome here! There will be a minimum ads possible(currently one banner at settings page) 

 Also, I can recommend some great Diablo II info websites: 
 diablo2.io 
 metadiablo.com
